-- prestep_server.go --
package main

import (
	"context"
	"encoding/json"
	"fmt"
	"io/ioutil"
	"net"
	"net/http"
	"os"
	"os/signal"
	"runtime"
	"strings"
)

func main() {
	signals := make(chan os.Signal)
	signal.Notify(signals)

	// Version information
	http.HandleFunc("/", func(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) {
		defer panicExit()
		version := getVersion()
		if r.Method != "GET" || r.URL.Query().Get("get-version") != "1" {
			w.WriteHeader(http.StatusBadRequest)
			return
		}
		fmt.Fprintf(w, "%v", version)
	})

	// The "method" we support
	http.HandleFunc("/somewhere", func(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) {
		defer panicExit()
		version := getVersion()
		if r.Method != "POST" {
			w.WriteHeader(http.StatusBadRequest)
			return
		}
		var args struct {
			Message string
		}
		dec := json.NewDecoder(r.Body)
		if err := dec.Decode(&args); err != nil {
			panic(err)
		}
		var out struct {
			Vars []string
		}
		val := args.Message
		if version != "1" {
			val = "other"
		}
		out.Vars = append(out.Vars, "GREETING="+val)
		enc := json.NewEncoder(w)
		if err := enc.Encode(out); err != nil {
			panic(err)
		}
	})

	addr := ":0"
	if len(os.Args) == 2 {
		addr = os.Args[1]
	}

	srv := &http.Server{}
	l, err := net.Listen("tcp", addr)
	if err != nil {
		panic(err)
	}
	fmt.Printf("%v\n", l.Addr().(*net.TCPAddr).Port)

	idleConnsClosed := make(chan struct{})
	go func() {
		sigint := make(chan os.Signal, 1)
		signal.Notify(sigint, os.Interrupt)
		<-sigint
		if err := srv.Shutdown(context.Background()); err != nil {
			panic(err)
		}
		close(idleConnsClosed)
	}()
	if err := srv.Serve(l); err != http.ErrServerClosed {
		panic(err)
	}
	<-idleConnsClosed
}

func panicExit() {
	err := recover()
	if err != nil {
		buf := make([]byte, 1<<20)
		n := runtime.Stack(buf, true)
		fmt.Fprintf(os.Stderr, "panic: %v\n\n%s", err, buf[:n])
		os.Exit(1)
	}
}

func getVersion() string {
	f, err := ioutil.ReadFile("version")
	if err != nil {
		panic(err)
	}
	return strings.TrimSpace(string(f))
}
